name: Easy Blog Ideas
author: EasyBlogIdeas

sections.description:
Have you ever run out of story ideas for your blog? You’re not alone.

Blog owners and writers know that regular content engages customers and helps with their search rank. But, after a while, ideas are harder to come by. Easy Blog Ideas is the answer. It quickly finds stories in your niche that have the most social traction.

Easy Blog Ideas analyzes what content performs best for any topic or competitor, using social media data.

Powerful Content Insights

Discover the most shared and content across all social networks. Our advanced social search engine finds the most « applaused » content (likes, +1, etc.) for a topic or domain.

Instant Search of Last 3 Months

With Easy Blog Ideas you get fast results. Do an instant search of the last 3 months. In the Premium version, you can select date ranges.

View All Social Networks

The plugin shows the share activity across all the major social networks including Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter (beta), Google Plus and Pinterest.

Content Curation

Add value to your content strategy with curated content. Discover interesting and trending content! With one click you can either bookmark it or start writing a draft blog post straight away. Your draft post will automatically contain a suggested title and slug.

Competitor Analysis

Search the most shared content for a competitor’s domain to see what is working for them. See the content formats they are using and the networks where they are getting most success.

More Features in the Premium version!

We’ve just released a Premium version that will provide you with valuable new features:

  • Email alerts / daily story ideas. No WordPress login needed.
  • RSS Feeds: integrate with Buffer, Feedly, IFTTT, Zapier, etc. and automate content curation!
  • Advanced search with content types (blog posts, videos, images, case studies, ebooks, etc.)
  • Date ranges, from 24-hour to 12-month social media history.
  • Filter search results by social network, relevance, engagement, etc.
  • Additional social networks like Instagram, Youtube, Reddit, Hacker News, Tumblr, StumbleUpon, …
  • If you’re interested in these features please subscribe to our list.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the `/wp-content/plugins/easy-blog-ideas` directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Find the ‘Easy Blog Ideas’ menu in the WordPress backend left menu
  4. Start with the ‘Find Ideas’ submenu to start looking for ideas
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the `/wp-content/plugins/easy-blog-ideas` directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Find the ‘Easy Blog Ideas’ menu in the WordPress backend left menu
  4. Start with the ‘Find Ideas’ submenu to start looking for ideas

 

What is Easy Blog Ideas?

A fast way to find popular stories in your niche. Just type your keyword/s and Easy Blog ideas returns a list of stories as ‘story cards’/ Each card shows the headline, photo, source, and social shares.

Why do I need Easy Blog Ideas?

Blog owners and content marketers need to know what consumers in their niche are reading about and sharing. Armed with these insights you can easily get ideas for writing the kind of content your audience wants.

How much does it cost?

Easy Blog Ideas is 100% free. If you want more features, please support us and subscribe to the Premium version.

Which social networks are currently supported by Easy Blog Ideas?

We support Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Google Plus and Pinterest. The Premium version supports many more networks like Instagram, Youtube, Reddit, Hacker News, Tumblr, StumbleUpon,…

Does Easy Blog Ideas work with any theme?

Yes. It’s completely independent of themes.
